stk.ga.plotting module¶

A module for defining plotting functions.

stk.ga.plotting.fitness_epp(pop, plot_name=False, dump_name=None, xlabel='Generation')¶

Plots the min, max and avg fitness values of each subpopulation.

Also saves the plot data in a csv file.

Parameters:
  • pop (GAPopulation) – A population containing any number of subpopulations and no direct members. Each subpopulation represents a generation of the GA.
  • plot_name (str or bool, optional) – The full path to where the plot should be saved. If False then no plot is made. Useful if you only want the dump file and not graph.
  • dump_name (str, optional) – The path to the file where the data to make the graph is dumped. If None then plot_name is used but with a .csv extension.
  • xlabel (str, optional) – The label on the x-axis.
Returns:

None
Return type:

NoneType
stk.ga.plotting.parameter_epp(pop, plot_name=False, dump_name=None, xlabel='Generation')¶

Plots the MacroMolecule.progress_params values.

For each element in progress_params a separate graph will be produced. Each will show subpopulations on the x-axis and the min, max and avg values of that progress_params element on the y-axis.

Also saves the plot data in a csv file.

Parameters:
  • pop (GAPopulation) – A population containing any number of subpopulations and no direct members. Each subpopulation represents a generation of the GA.
  • plot_name (str or bool, optional) – The full path to where the plot should be saved. If False then no plot is made. Useful if you only want the dump file and not graph.
  • dump_name (str, optional) – The path to the file where the data to make the graph is dumped. If None then plot_name is used but with a .csv extension.
  • xlabel (str, optional) – The label on the x-axis.
Returns:

None
Return type:

NoneType
stk.ga.plotting.plot_counter(counter, plot_name)¶

Saves a .png file holding a plot of counter.

The counter should hold the number of times a certain population member was selected.

Parameters:
  • counter (collections.Counter) – A counter of which members of a population were selected.
  • plot_name (str) – The full path of the .png where the plot is to be saved.
Returns:

None
Return type:

NoneType
